title: Guess the font please!
content:
Dear  
I need to know the font used in the text below. both main font and the little at top in blue. thank you in advance.

I believe the Guru's at this famous font will help me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803220017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/123_5012.png)
author: ihtxam

comments.content: Wrong forum; this is General Discussions, TypeID requests not allowed. On the right of your screen click on Font ID and post your request there, or you can click ==\> [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803220017/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid) to go to the same place.
